# Demo Fork Cloud Kitchen Demo Website

## Project Overview
- Modern Next.js demo website for Demo Fork cloud kitchen
- Location: Moodabidri
- Purpose: Demo site to pitch to potential client

## Setup Status
- [x] Project scaffolding
- [x] Landing page with hero section
- [x] Photo gallery for specials
- [x] Instagram placeholder section
- [x] Menu page
- [x] Final styling and polish

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14.2.35 (latest secure stable version - NO vulnerabilities)
- React 18.3.1
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Lucide React Icons

## Running the Project
```bash
npm run dev
```
Visit http://localhost:3000
